title: Magical Rainbow Mont Blanc at Ginza Cozy Corner
text:
Ginza Cozy Corner, a cake shop that sells other various sweets like cream puffs and pudding, is holding a special Mont Blanc campaign. Of the six types of Mont Blanc sold at Cozy Corner, the new Magical Rainbow Mont Blanc is being sold for a limited time only, until Oct 17.

After digging into the rainbow layer of cream flavored strawberry, lemon, melon and blueberry, there is custard cream and popping candy waiting inside as a surprise. The soft pastel colors and sprinkles make for the perfect aesthetic to show off on Instagram.

One Magical Rainbow Mont Blanc costs 626 yen with tax.

© Japan Today
